name: url-shortener-server
description:
Task : Develop a URL shortening web Application with Frontend and backend.

Demo : https://karthee-urlshortsapp-000001.herokuapp.com/

My WorkFlow : https://coggle.it/diagram/YacO1DOIUp_w4J5u/t/url-shortner

Features :
  • public route (Complete authentication system)

  • protected route (to create a shortUrl,get all shortUrls created by particular user)

  • redirect route (to redirect to the original URl - using res.redirect()-mtd provided by express)
author: rhagavi
